Class GeneHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.GeneHandler

  • public class GeneHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class reads reference genes from a txt and stores them

    lovisheindrich

      • addGene

        public static void addGene(java.lang.String genePath,
                           java.lang.String geneName,
                           java.lang.String geneSequence)
                    throws DuplicateGeneException,
                           java.io.IOException
        add a new gene to genes.txt
        Parameters:
        genePath - path of the genes.txt file
        geneName - name of the gene
        geneSequence - sequence string of the gene
        Throws:
        DuplicateGeneException - gene name already exists
        java.io.IOException - error while writing the file

      • addGene

        public static boolean addGene(java.lang.String geneName,
                              java.lang.String geneSequence,
                              java.lang.String organism,
                              java.lang.String comment)
                       throws DuplicateGeneException,
                              java.io.IOException
        add a new gene to genes.txt
        Parameters:
        genePath - path of the genes.txt file
        geneName - name of the gene
        geneSequence - sequence string of the gene
        organism - more informations about the gene sequence
        comment - specific comment to this gene sequence
        Throws:
        DuplicateGeneException - gene name already exists
        java.io.IOException - error while writing the file
